item.title: Dirac's 90-Year-Old "Mistake" Unifies All of Physics
item.description: As a listener of TOE you can get a special 20% off discount to The Economist and all it has to offer! Visit https://www.economist.com/toe In this episode, I speak with Professor Felix Finster, a radical thinker reimagining the foundations of physics. We explore his theory of causal fermion systems, where reality emerges from quantum correlationsâ€”without assuming spacetime or geometry... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/TOE4643226064
